Today on the Dingle Peninsula, it's looking good with 6 ft @8s WSW swell and light 12 mph S winds. Best spots include Ballybunion Right and Ballybunion Beach, both working well from 09:27 to 17:27. Tomorrow, conditions drop significantly with 14 ft @13s W swell and fresh 25 mph WSW winds, making it poor across the board. The day after continues the trend with 12 ft @12s WNW swell and 19 mph W winds, still not ideal. Best: today.
